mapper.select: select bi.*, m.email as member_email, bl.cateogry_idx as bucket_list_category_idx, bl.title as bucket_list_title, bl.start_date as bucket_list_start_date, bl.completion_date as bucket_list_completion_date, c.name as category_name, c.scr as category_scr from bucket_item bi left join bucket_list bl on bl.idx = bi.bucket_list_idx left join member m on m.idx = bi.member_idx left join category c on bl.category_idx = c.idx order by bi.idx
select bi.*, c.name, c.src from bucket_item bi left join category c on bi.category_idx = c.idx where bi.member_idx = #{idx} order by bi.idx
select * from bucket_item where title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into bucket_item(bucket_list_idx, member_idx, title, content, completion_date) values (#{bucket_list_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{completion_date})
